name: TPL_STUDY_ENROLMTS
description: This table stores a list of the patient's research study enrollments that are associated with a given treatment plan.

columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the plan record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ENROLLMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores a list of the patient's research study enrollments (LAR records) that are linked to this treatment plan.
